snippet: Macy’s says it will close 35 to 40 stores in early 2016, or as much as 5 percent of its namesake stores.
abstract: Macy's announces that it will close 35 to 40 stores in 2016; has not yet selected all stores that will shutdown.
lead_paragraph: Macy’s says it will close 35 to 40 stores in early 2016, or as much as 5 percent of its namesake stores.

headline.main: Macy’s Says It Plans to Close Up to 40 Stores Early Next Year
headline.print_headline: Macy’s Says It Plans to Close Up to 40 Stores Early Next Year
